Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 173rd overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Charles Taylor (COL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/13/2015, off Clark Staggs (DET)...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Injured on 8/20/2016 with a Broken Finger, out for 5 weeks...
